title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a validated Invoice system using Pydantic-style patterns:
- InvoiceItem with name, quantity, unit_price (all validated)
- Invoice with items list, computed subtotal, tax, and total
- Validate quantity > 0, unit_price >= 0
- Tax rate configurable, defaults to 8%
instructions:
Create a validated Invoice system using Pydantic-style patterns:
- InvoiceItem with name, quantity (int > 0), unit_price (float >= 0)
- Invoice with customer, items list, tax_rate (default 0.08)
- Computed fields: subtotal, tax_amount, total
- All validation in __post_init__ or property

hints.text: Use __post_init__ for validation. For frozen dataclasses, use object.__setattr__ to modify values in __post_init__. Use @property for computed fields.

commonMistakes.mistake: Modifying self.field in __post_init__ of frozen dataclass
